name: Specimen.condition
title: Specimen.condition
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: A mode or state of being that describes the nature of the specimen.
element.comment: Specimen condition is an observation made about the specimen.  It's a point-in-time assessment.  It can be used to assess its quality or appropriateness for a specific test.
element.requirements: The specimen condition can be used to assess its quality or appropriateness for a specific test.

binding.description: Codes describing the state of the specimen.
